scripts.deploy:mainnet:hosted: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-prize-pool-mainnet subgraph.mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ pooltogether/v5-prize-pool-eth-goerli subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.all-goerli: yarn clean && yarn prepare:goerli && yarn gen:goerli && yarn deploy:goerli
scripts.all-mainnet:hosted: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:hosted
scripts.all-mainnet:decentralized: yarn clean && yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn gen:mainnet && yarn deploy:mainnet:decentralized
